name: Pretzel Land
description:
"Beautiful graphics, uplifting soundtrack, fun for everyone" – Appgemeinde.de

Create a beautiful, vibrant bavarian village! Raise crops, construct buildings, brew beer, make your people happy. There’s always something to do around the village!

Pretzel Land is an innovative building game with a unique setting: Done by Bavarian developers, published by a Bavarian publisher, this deep strategy game breathes Bavarian atmosphere. It has it all: authentic art, fitting music, beer gardens. And pretzls!

-----------
FEATURES
-----------
- Intuitive controls
- Clever production queues
- Fresh setting (Bavaria)
- Authentic music
- Beautiful art style
- Dozens of buildings

Please note:

- This game requires an active internet connection to play. Please make sure your device is connected while playing.

- Pretzel Land is completely free to download and free to play. However, some items in the game can be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
